recipients.is-email: Each value in recipients must be an email

carbon-copies.is-array: Carbon copies must be an array
carbon-copies.is-email: Each value in carbon copies must be an email

blind-carbon-copies.is-array: Blind carbon copies must be an array
blind-carbon-copies.is-email: Each value in blind carbon copies must be an email

tfa-code.min: Code must be greater than or equal to 100000
tfa-code.max: Code must be least than or equal to 999999

ttl-formatted.is-string: TTL Formatted must be a string
ttl-formatted.is-not-empty: TTL Formatted must not be empty
